skills.name: AIR STRIKE
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• Marks can be consumed with Perfect Hits to deal additional true damage.

skills.name: RADAR
desc: • 45% Chance to Silence all enemies for 1 turn.
• 50% Chance to gain an Extra Turn.

skills.name: FOCUS
desc: Grants increased Accuracy to all allies for 2 turns at the start of battle.
